Angela Yee, GiGi Maguire, Stephanie Santiago and Claudia Jordan have 50 Cent describe what the first night with him would be like, and he discusses the difference between girls and women and wanting to please your man. Welcome to Angela Yee's Lip Service Podcast, home to the realest talk about sex and relationships in hip-hop!  The Real Housewives of Atlanta's Claudia Jordan is the guest on the debut episode, where she's joined by Angela's co-hosts Stephanie Santiago and GiGi Maguire.

The discussion touches on when's the right time to tell your man how many other dudes you've slept with, watching your own sex tapes, what August Alsina's penis looked like and why every man does not need Magnums.
